price: 17. Nous avons éprouvé avant eux le peuple de Pharaon, alors que leur était déjà venu un digne Messager.[488]
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَجَآءَهُمۡ رَسُولٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad fatannā qablahum qawma fir'ʿawna wajāahum rasūlun karīmun
